name: WE LOST THE SEA - THE QUIETEST PLACE ON EARTH (DOUBLE VINYL - Standard Edition)
description:
Genre: Post Metal / Sludge / Doom

The Quietest Place on Earth is the follow up to We Lost the Sea’s acclaimed first record, ‘Crimea.’ This record displays the band in peak form, showing maturity in song writing and an unprecedented culmination of styles.

Comes with download code.

Chris Torpy - R.I.P.

name: We Lost The Sea - The Quietest Place On Earth (CD digipack)
description:
Genre: Post Metal / Sludge / Doom

The Quietest Place on Earth is the follow up to We Lost the Sea’s acclaimed first record, ‘Crimea.’ This album displays the band in peak form, showing maturity in song writing and an unprecedented culmination of styles.

name: Sundowning - Seizures of The World LP
description:
Genre: Atmospheric Sludge Metal/Post-Hardcore/Doom

German multi-genre act, Sundowning play an authentically tantalising mixture of Post Hard-core, Downtempo and Sludge.

Vinyl comes with download code.

name: Alaskan - Adversity; Woe LP
description:
Genre: Atmospheric Sludge Metal

Alaskan’s full length concept album pressed to 140g vinyl. Each layout has been cut, silkscreened and assembled by hand. A total of 525 records were pressed. Comes with digital download and stickers.

name: Orwell - Avohfasih (CD)
description:
Genre: Melodic Death Metal/Metalcore

Primarily based out of Wisconsin, Orwell hail from the Northern Midwest landscapes of the United States.  The five piece are collectively made up of Cris Bissell (drums), Logan Hauser (vocals), Erik Bolstad (guitar), Tim Bradley (guitar) and Will Strickland (bass).  Adam Clemens (Iron Thrones) also makes an appearance on ‘In Tides, I Wake’.

The band recently unleashed their second offering entitled Avohfasih, forty six minutes of positive aural brutality.  The concept of grieving is touched upon with such favourableness and beautiful musicianship, the ferociousness in Hauser’s vocals can be mistaken for bitterness if you did not read the lyrics, yet the album looks at the concept of loss in such an admiring and positive light.  Quite impressive, how the group manage to channel this awesome power in a direction much less travelled by artists of this genre.

‘In Depths I Sink’ is an At The Gates style pummeling, whereas the closing ‘A New Awakening’ is a much calmer affair, although still tremendously heavy and wonderfully uplifting.

The limited edition physical copy of AVOHFASIH was put together completely by the band itself. Every last copy was printed, folded, stapled, glued, and finally wax sealed shut by the band. It includes a 16 panel booklet with corresponding photography by the band, all lyrics, and is hand numbered 1-300.

All paper materials used are 100% recycled.

*less than 4 remaining*
